original_text: He did what was evil in the sight of the Lord and followed the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, which he made Israel to sin; he did not depart from them.
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 죄를 따라가고 거기서 떠나지 아니하였으므로

sentences.original_text: He did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주의 보시기에 악한 행위를 했으며

sentences.original_text: and followed the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat
which he made Israel to sin
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이스라엘로 죄를 범하게 한 것이라

sentences.original_text: he did not depart from them
